name: Ubergine
description:
This is our entry for Ludum Dare 46!

UBERGINE

You must water the Ubergine until it is fully grown whilst keeping the hipsters that are trying to eat it at bay!

Arrow Keys or Left Stick - Move Dingus
WASD or Right Stick - Move Gundog

Gamepad support is basic so you have to use the D-Pad in menus, sorry!

Quick Note I’m trying to sort out the EXE so it won’t get flagged up by Windows but I’m new at this! 😂
